head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEIN, HARRY G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEIN, HARRY G.

block.p: WEIN-Harry G. Died August 21. Cherished husband and best friend of Geraldine for fifty-four years. Adoring father of Steven, Amy and Nancy and father-in-law of Nela, Tom and Dan. Proud grandfather of Julia. Beloved brother of Myron and Leon. Memorial service, Wednesday, August 23 at 10:30 AM at Stephen Wise Free Synagogue, 30 West 68th St.

WEIN-Harry G. Died August 21. Cherished husband and best friend of Geraldine for fifty-four years. Adoring father of Steven, Amy and Nancy and father-in-law of Nela, Tom and Dan.
